attributes.action: Demand that the 2012 Olympic Committee scrap the new logo and produce one that the British people can be proud of
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new 2012 Olympic logo unveiled yesterday is chaotic, messy and garish. We should have a logo that shows we are proud to be British - not a replication of a Tiswas logo.
Please sign this petition if you want the 2012 Olympic committee to scrap the logo and produce something far more appropriate

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
